Episodes.Title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab

Episodes.Title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods. Meanwhile, Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessica Mecklenburg
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Four: The Body
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Justin Doble
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover. Jonathan and Nancy form an unlikely alliance.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Alison Tatlock
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Hopper breaks into the lab to find the truth about Will's death. The boys try to locate the "gate" that will take them to Will.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Six: The Monster
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Jessie Nickson-Lopez
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: A frantic Jonathan looks for Nancy in the darkness, but Steve's looking for her, too. Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about the lab's experiments.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Justin Doble
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: The government comes searching for Eleven. Eleven looks for Will and Barb in the Upside Down.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Joyce and Hopper are taken in for questioning. Nancy and Jonathan prepare to fight the monster and save Will.
